title: How to Save Live Photos As a Video

steps.headline: Capture a Live Photo.
steps.description: If you want to learn more about taking a Live Photo, you can read How to Take Live Photos on iPhone. Essentially, you need to tap the Live button at the top of the camera screen to activate Live Photos mode. Your Live Photo will range from 1.5 to 2 seconds. You can enable and disable Live Photos by tapping on the Live icon at the top of the screen when viewing a photo. If the icon is yellow-orange and says "Live," then the Live Photo feature is enabled.
